name: Into the White (itch)
description: Into the White is a 2d horizontal version of the action shooting game, the game uses the Unity2d engine, game platform: PC. The legendary deeds of heroes are told in the background of World War II. Players play as a British infantryman. The task is to find the downed plane, rescue the captured pilot, protect the pilot to the enemy air base, and finally fly the plane to escape.
